items.question: Can we invite collaborators from other departments?
items.answer: Absolutely. You can invite unlimited collaborators, share tailored workspaces, and control access with granular permissions.

items.question: Does Kraft integrate with our current tools?
items.answer: Yes. Connect Slack, Jira, GitHub, and over 30 other tools to keep your sources of truth in sync.

items.question: Is there a free plan?
items.answer: Kraft offers a generous free plan for up to 5 editors and unlimited viewers so you can explore before upgrading.
